title: Ashe is bs please nerf.
body: Literally killed me faster as 4K HP Shyv with 200 armor than Vayne does.

replies.body: Seriously ? Just stack armor. Use your blade of ruined king to slow her and Ult or W to her and just kill her. Or you can get Randuin's Omen for the Aoe slow and just kill her from there. Ashe is immobile and once she got CCed she is dead and with blade of ruined king and Stalker's blade you should have enough to kill her.
